COTS.description: Indicates if this is a Commercial Off-The-Shelf software application. Custom in-house developed application should have this set to false.

FOSS.description: Indicates if this is a Free or Open-Source software application or library. Custom in-house developed application should have this set to false.

SaaS.description: Indicates if this is a Software-as-a-Service product.

external.description: Indicates if this is an externally acquired software application. Custom in-house developed application should have this set to false.

mobile.description: Indicates if this is a mobile app.

licenseURL.description: The URL to the full license

alternateURLs.description: The additional URLs related to this application.
